properties.areaDesc: Mono; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Northern Washoe County; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Surprise Valley California; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 1:56PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* Unusually pronounced high pressure will build into the region
through Saturday, bringing above normal temperatures and mostly
sunny skies. Temperatures Saturday could approach record highs.
No doubt a great time for outdoor recreation or even yard work
you've been putting off.

* On Sunday a strong cold front will push quickly through the
region, yielding strong winds and snow. Widespread strong
southwest winds Sunday morning will turn to the northwest behind
the front Sunday afternoon/evening. This will result in impacts
for high profile vehicles and rough air for aviation. Highways
395 and 95, especially south of I-80, are at particular risk of
wind impacts. This includes Walker Lake and Mono County.

* A brief period of higher intensity snow is also likely during
the day Sunday, which could cause travel impacts on roadways
including across Sierra passes. Road impacts in Western Nevada
cities are more uncertain due to warm ground temperatures.
However, don't be surprised if there are slick roads coming home
from Sunday afternoon gatherings. Icy spots on roadways could
linger into Monday morning.

* Monday into Tuesday will feature cold temperatures, certainly
compared to what we've seen recently. Temperatures Monday will
be some 30 degrees colder versus highs on Saturday. Brisk north
winds will remind us all that it is still winter. Snow showers
are possible in this cold airmass, including lake effect snow
squalls south of Pyramid, Tahoe, and Walker Lakes. This could
affect travel on I-80 between Reno and Fernley during the Monday
morning commute.

NWSheadline: From April Back to February This Weekend
